definition: time/one of the 12 two-hour periods of the day
surname Shi
old variant of 時|时[shi2]
o'clock/time/when/hour/season/period
5th earthly branch: 7-9 a.m., 3rd solar month (5th April-4th May), year of the Dragon/ancient Chinese compass point: 120°
twelve divisions of the day of early Chinese and Babylonian timekeeping and astronomy
the time has not yet come

sentences.english: Who make you mushroom so late, the whole ruddy blood temple you this hour equitable obtain up.
sentences.chinese: 谁让你起得这么晚，整个赤血宫就你这个时辰才起床。

sentences.english: I started to learn English when I was a child.
sentences.chinese: 当我海华丝一个小孩子的时辰，我就瞥绶学英语了。

sentences.english: You ever hear white people callin' each other honky all the time?
sentences.chinese: 你什么时辰听过白人互相等号“白鬼”吗，兄弟？

sentences.english: At this time of the year farmers to capalternating currentity to plow their fields.
sentences.chinese: 每年这个时辰，农民们滥觞犁地。

sentences.english: Don't have the horse running all the time.
sentences.chinese: 不能让马儿时辰不停地跑。

sentences.english: Youve come at the right time.
Animals think much while building their houses.
sentences.chinese: 动物在建造衡宇的时辰思虑的较多。

sentences.english: Half of two-hour period empress, all talented persons stopped eating greatly to greatly nectar.
sentences.chinese: 半个时辰后，所有人才停止了大吃大喝。

sentences.english: When wilt thou sort an hour great strifes to end?
sentences.chinese: 你选定什么时辰终止剧烈的纷争？

sentences.english: My dad was diagnosed with multiple sclerosis in the prime of hellos life.
sentences.chinese: 我爸爸被诊断有多种硬化症，当他丁壮的时辰。

sentences.english: but don't forget the times your luck has turned.
sentences.chinese: 但不要健忘你否极泰来的时辰。

sentences.english: We will now make some rings around chrono circles to get some depth.
sentences.chinese: 现在我们就可以围绕时辰界一些环获得一些深度。

sentences.english: Will you be passing the post office when you're out?
sentences.chinese: 你出去的时辰会不会颠末邮政局？

sentences.english: 'What hour?'asked the Rat worriedly , looking at the clock on the wall.
sentences.chinese: “什么时辰？”水鼠担心的问，看著墙上的钟。

sentences.english: When it rained, the soil washed away, down the hills and into the rivers.
sentences.chinese: 当下雨的时辰，泥土被冲走，从赡上滑下进进河内。

sentences.english: He didn't tell me when we should meet again.
sentences.chinese: 他没有告诉我啥子时辰我们能再晤面。
